testcase.name: FreeCRM add new Company
testcase.system-out: Given User is already on login page.........................................passed When Title of login page is <"Cogmento CRM">................................passed Then User login into application............................................passed And Verify login successful.................................................passed Then Navigate to Companies page.............................................passed Then Click on add new Company...............................................passed And Enter "CitiusTech" , "www.citiustech.com" , "CitiusTech is a specialist provider of healthcare technology services and solutions, with strong presence across the globe" and save.passed And Logout..................................................................passed
